content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5) and pipes at positions (x=-7.5, y=24.5) and (x=5.5, y=3.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)

### Copper cable factory
No information available

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target position is empty before placing an entity
- Make sure you are close enough to the target position to place the entity

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are compatible and can be connected
- Check that the entities are not already connected by the same pipe group

### Errors when using pipes
- Make sure the pipe is placed at a valid position
- Ensure the pipe is connected to the correct entities

### Errors when using offshore pump and steam engine
- Ensure the offshore pump and steam engine are connected by the same pipe group
- Check that the offshore pump and steam engine are working correctly and have the necessary resources
